column1: Funeral Services for Mrs. Fundanish will be held at the Chester C. Chidboy Funeral Home
column2: Inc. of Curwensville on Monday June 22
column4: with the Reverend Charles M. Lee Jr. officiating.  Interment will be in the Fruit Hill Cemetery
column6: PA.  Friends will be received at the funeral home on Sunday June 21
column8: and again on Monday from 10 AM until time of services
